title: Bunny Lake Is Missing
description: ...or was she? No one at school remembered seeing her. There were no records of her registration... no clothes in the apartment where she was supposed to have lived... nothing at all to convince the police that there ever really was a Bunny Lake...The basis for the Otto Preminger movie starring Laurence Olivier, Carol Lynley, Keir Dullea, Martita Hunt, Anna Massey, The Zombies, and NoÃ«l Coward.
author: Evelyn Piper
